page.title: 04SPORTING FACILITIES (CONT)
page.content: Squash, Swimming(life saving, water polo, diving,canoeing,sub aqua diving) Table Tennis, Tennis, Trampolining, Volleyball, Weight Training Weight Lifting, Wrestling, Yoga, Ballroom Dancing, Ballet, Aikido, Bridge,Chess, Tug-of-war and Archery. There is also an Archery Centre situated at Glyncornel Woods,Llwynypia which is unique in Britain, and even in Europe. Independently of the Council, the Rhondda's Archery Club," Pentref Bowmen", was formed in 1952. Ton Pentre is the Headquarters of the "Pentref Bowmen." The World Championship for this sport has been held at Glyncornel.
